title: Master Chef Tahm Kench recall bug

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
A small bug I found when playing as {{champion:223}} with the Master Chef skin. 
This happens every time you recall as him with this skin, so it's definitely something worth fixing.

replies.body:
Hey! 

Thanks for the report. :) This issue will be fixed with the next patch.

> [{quoted}](name=Joloxi,realm=NA,application-id=LqLKtMpN,discussion-id=ayXtrvaV,comment-id=,timestamp=2017-07-31T13:46:39.573+0000)
>
> A small bug I found when playing as {{champion:223}} with the Master Chef skin. 
> This happens every time you recall as him with this skin, so it&#039;s definitely something worth fixing.

actually this is also for his taunt (where his knife is stuck to his prong thing) and when he has 2 stacks of his passive on a person (just like with taunt)
At first I couldn't see what was wrong because I don't play the champion nor have the skin, but then I saw the knives lol.
